info.title: Amazon EC2 Placement Groups API
info.description: The API for management Placement Groups

get.summary: Creates a placement group that you launch cluster instances into.
get.description: Creates a placement group that you launch cluster instances into.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: A name for the placement group.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the placement group.

get.summary: Describes one or more of your placement groups.
get.description: Describes one or more of your placement groups.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: GroupName.N
parameters.description: One or more placement group names.
